{"id":931040063,"question_id":2721,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681097005,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/931040063/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Distances","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long[] distance(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        long[] res = new long[len];\n        \n        \n        HashMap<Integer, List<Integer>> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            map.putIfAbsent(nums[i], new ArrayList<>());\n             map.get(nums[i]).add(i);\n        }\n        \n        \n        for(Map.Entry<Integer, List<Integer>> en : map.entrySet()){\n            \n            int val = en.getKey();\n            List<Integer> list = en.getValue();\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<list.size(); i++){\n                \n                for(int j=i+1; j<list.size(); j++){\n                    \n                    \n                    int idx_i = list.get(i);\n                    int idx_j = list.get(j);\n                    \n                    res[idx_i]+= Math.abs(idx_i-idx_j);\n                    res[idx_j]+= Math.abs(idx_i- idx_j);\n                }\n            }\n            \n            \n            \n            \n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-distances","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
